snippet: Ms. Hochul, a former congresswoman, has had a roller-coaster political career as a rising star in the Democratic Party in New York and as a victim of its upstate troubles.
abstract: Kathy Hochul, New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo’s pick for lieutenant governor, is seen by some as a symbol of his problems with left-leaning Democrats; as Democratic primary looms, Hochul is in surprisingly spirited showdown with Tim Wu, Columbia Law School professor running alongside Zephyr Teachout, who has called the governor and his running mate too far to the right for New York.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Hochul, a former congresswoman, has had a roller-coaster political career as a rising star in the Democratic Party in New York and as a victim of its upstate troubles.

headline.main: Kathy Hochul, Cuomo’s Choice for Lieutenant Governor, Is No Stranger to the Spotlight
headline.print_headline: Cuomo’s Choice for Lieutenant Governor Is No Stranger to the Spotlight
